sections.title: Hell Knight Signifer (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Hell Knight Signifer class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Hell Knight Signifer)
sections.description: Grants proficiency with heavy armor and one favored weapon of the Hell Knight's chosen order.

sections.title: Aura of Law ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Hell Knight Signifer)
sections.description: Creates an aura of law with power equal to the character's total level, detectable by detect law and similar effects.

sections.title: Catechesis ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Hell Knight Signifer)
sections.description: Allows Hell Knight signifer levels to stack with divine spellcasting classes for domain powers when having Warrior Priest feat, and grants Alignment Channel (chaos) as a bonus feat.

sections.title: Order (Hell Knight Signifer)
sections.description: The signifer chooses a Hell Knight order to join, which determines their favored weapon and organizational allegiance.

sections.title: Signifer Mask (Su) (Hell Knight Signifer)
sections.description: Provides a magical mask that grants bonuses to Sense Motive and saves against visual effects, and can be converted into an arcane bonded item.

sections.title: Arcane Armor Expertise (Hell Knight Signifer)
sections.description: Grants Arcane Armor Mastery as a bonus feat and improves its action economy from swift to immediate action at higher levels.

sections.title: Signifer Armor Training (Hell Knight Signifer)
sections.description: Reduces armor check penalty and arcane spell failure chance while wearing armor, and offsets speed reduction at higher levels.

sections.title: Assiduous Gaze (Hell Knight Signifer)
sections.description: Grants supernatural gaze abilities that can analyze creatures, objects, or areas for magical properties, alignment, or hidden features.

sections.title: Discern Lies (Sp) (Hell Knight Signifer)
sections.description: Grants the ability to use discern lies as a spell-like ability multiple times per day based on Charisma modifier.

sections.title: Infernal Resilience ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Hell Knight Signifer)
sections.description: Provides damage reduction against chaotic attacks and complete immunity to poison effects.

sections.title: Diabolic Harbinger (Su) (Hell Knight Signifer)
sections.description: Grants telepathy, perfect darkvision, immunity to visual impairments, and bonuses when interacting with lawful creatures while wearing the signifer mask.
